input.sentences: i went on vacation last weekend .
it took me forever to find a place to park .
afterward i spent some time browsing the local shops .
there were many classic cars on the road there .
output.sentences: The house appears quaint. thought Judy.
Judy texted her partner. "Did you bring the bags dear?"
Yeah we can do this she thought.
Of course I brought the bags of ammunition, but I think ten thousand rounds is too much. her partner relied from his parked blue car.
Well I do always cross my T,s and dot my I's as she looked at the village through her thousand yard stare.
